issue.title: [C++] Name the C++ streaming execution engine
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16626](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16626). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is some desire on the mailing list to name the C++ execution engine.  Although there isn't really any code impact from such a change we should update our documentation to refer to the engine by name.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16626?focusedCommentId=17545182) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13207
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13207>
